title: Betting on an Unpredictable Week 17
description:
We take a look at the teams fighting for their playoff lives and others with less clear intentions in week 17 through the lens of the sports bettor. Later, we go more in depth on Sunday matchups with playoff implications like Rams-Cardinals, Bears-Packers, and more (48:00).
Hosts: Warren Sharp and Joe House
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
